item.title: 欧洲央行行长维勒鲁瓦特朗普的经济议程给全球经济和通胀回归带来风险
item.description: 法国央行行长兼欧洲央行（ECB）委员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）周三表示，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普的经济议程有可能使美国重现通胀，并损害全球经济增长。【原文：U.S. President-elect Donald Trump's economic agenda risks returning inflation to the United States and hurting economic growth worldwide, Bank of France head and European Central Bank (ECB) member Francois Villeroy de Galhau said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Seven & i 公司报告的报价和迄今为止最大的管理层收购案
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司周三表示，已收到来自公司副总裁的收购建议，该副总裁是公司创始人伊藤家族的成员。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings said on Wednesday it has received a buyout proposal from its vice president who is a member of its founding Ito family.】

item.title: 特朗普获胜可能对匈牙利经济造成双重打击
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的胜利可能会给匈牙利领导人维克托-欧尔班带来政治上的好处，但在经济方面，特朗普对匈牙利来说是个坏消息--由于福林疲软和欧洲汽车行业可能受到的关税影响导致产量下降，从而增加了通胀风险。【原文：Donald Trump's victory may be a political boon for Hungarian leader Viktor Orban but on the economy, Trump is bad news for Hungary - adding to inflationary risks due to a weak forint and lower output due to possible tariffs on Europe's auto sector.】

item.title: 瑞穗金融集团将以 10 亿美元收购乐天卡 15%的股份
item.description: 日本瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group）周三表示，将以 1,650 亿日元（10.6 亿美元）的价格收购乐天集团子公司乐天卡（Rakuten Card）15% 的股份，进一步深化两家公司的战略联盟。【原文：Japan's Mizuho Financial Group will take a 15% stake in Rakuten Group subsidiary Rakuten Card for 165 billion yen ($1.06 billion) in a further deepening of the two companies' strategic alliance, they said on Wednesday.】

item.title: Just Eat 外卖公司以 6.5 亿美元出售美国部门 Grubhub
item.description: 欧洲最大的送餐公司 Just Eat Takeaway 周三表示，它已达成一项协议，将以 6.5 亿美元的价格把其美国部门 Grubhub 出售给 Wonder。【原文：Europe's biggest meal delivery firm Just Eat Takeaway said on Wednesday it struck a deal to sell its U.S. unit Grubhub to Wonder for $650 million.】

item.title: 西门子能源不提议在 2024 财年分红
item.description: 西门子能源公司没有提议在 2024 财年派发股息，理由是去年获得了由德国政府支持的项目担保，因此派息政策受到限制。【原文：Siemens Energy has not proposed a dividend for the 2024 fiscal year, citing limitations to its payout policy as a result of obtaining project guarantees last year that are backed by the German government.】

item.title: 越南航空公司明年招标 50 架窄体喷气机
item.description: 越南航空公司首席执行官周三表示，该公司将于明年向飞机制造商发出购买 50 架窄体喷气式飞机的招标书。【原文：Vietnam Airlines will issue a request for proposal to aircraft manufacturers next year to purchase 50 narrowbody jets, its CEO said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 早间竞价："特朗普交易 "在美国 CPI 前暂停喘息
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 独家报道：如果特朗普允许，中国电池巨头 CATL 将在美国建厂
item.description: 世界顶级电池制造商 CATL 的创始人兼董事长曾彦宏告诉路透社，如果美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对中国在电动汽车供应链的投资敞开大门，该公司将考虑在美国建厂。【原文：CATL , the world's top battery maker, will consider building a U.S. plant if President-elect Donald Trump opens the door to Chinese investment in the electric-vehicle supply chain, the company's founder and chairman, Robin Zeng, told Reuters.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 在电池领域之外进军电网和电动汽车平台领域
item.description: CATL 创始人、亿万富翁曾彦宏的目标是将全球最大的电池制造商重新打造为绿色能源供应商，并降低开发电动汽车的成本，从而颠覆推动其发展的行业经济学。【原文：Robin Zeng, the billionaire founder of CATL , aims to reinvent the world’s largest battery maker as a green-energy provider and to slash the cost of developing electric vehicles, upending the economics of the industry that has powered its growth.】

item.title: 英伟达和软银试运行全球首个人工智能和 5G 电信网络
item.description: 全球领先的芯片制造商英伟达（Nvidia）和软银集团（SoftBank Group）旗下电信部门软银公司（SoftBank Corp）周三表示，双方已试运行全球首个人工智能和5G电信网络。【原文：Leading chipmaker Nvidia and SoftBank Corp , the telecommunications arm of SoftBank Group , have piloted the world's first artificial intelligence and 5G telecoms network, the two companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国通胀引发债券收益率飙升，股市因不安而下滑
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市暴跌，原因是在可能影响美联储宽松政策步伐的关键通胀数据公布之前，美国债券收益率大幅上升令投资者感到不安。【原文：Asian stocks slumped on Wednesday as a sharp rise in U.S. bond yields unnerved investors ahead of key inflation data that could inform the pace of Federal Reserve policy easing.】

item.title: 韩国锌业撤回 18 亿美元股票出售计划，转向董事会争夺战
item.description: 韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc）周三表示，该公司已决定撤回其发行价值 18 亿美元新股的计划，因为该计划引发了金融监管部门的调查和该公司股票的抛售。【原文：Korea Zinc said on Wednesday it has decided to withdraw its plan to issue new shares worth $1.8 billion after the proposal sparked an investigation by the financial watchdog and a sell-off in the company's stock.】

item.title: 近期供应紧张，油价缩减跌幅
item.description: 周三，在欧佩克（OPEC）下调了2024年和2025年全球石油需求增长预测后，油价因近期供应紧张的迹象而略有上涨，但仍接近两周来的最低点。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Wednesday on signs of near-term supply tightness but remained near their lowest in two weeks a day after OPEC downgraded its forecast for global oil demand growth in 2024 and 2025.】

item.title: 日经新闻》和彭博社称，Seven & i 考虑启动管理层收购计划
item.description: 据《日经新闻》和彭博社周三报道，日本 Seven & i 控股公司正在考虑启动管理层收购，以实现零售商的私有化，这笔交易的价值可能高达 9 万亿日元（582 亿美元）。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings is considering launching a management buyout that would see the retailer go private, the Nikkei newspaper and Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, a deal that could be worth up to 9 trillion yen ($58.2 billion).】

item.title: 如果 EchoStar 债务交换要约失败，DirecTV 将放弃 Dish 收购计划
item.description: 卫星电视供应商 DirecTV 周二表示，如果债券持有人不同意债务交换，该公司将放弃在 11 月 22 日前收购 EchoStar 卫星电视业务（包括 Dish TV）的计划。【原文：Satellite TV provider DirecTV said on Tuesday it will abandon its planned acquisition of EchoStar's satellite television business that includes Dish TV by Nov. 22 if bondholders don't agree to a debt exchange.】

item.title: 中国称台积电芯片限制措施损害台湾企业利益
item.description: 中国国台办周三表示，美国命令台湾半导体制造股份有限公司停止向中国客户运送先进芯片，这损害了台湾公司的利益，加剧了台海两岸的紧张局势。【原文：China's Taiwan Affairs Office said on Wednesday that a U.S. order to Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co to halt shipments of advanced chips to Chinese customers undermines the interests of Taiwanese companies and raises tension across the Taiwan Strait.】

item.title: 中国如何减少对美国农产品进口的依赖，缓和贸易战风险
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就任第一任总统期间，中美两国在贸易战中针锋相对地征收关税以来，中国政府已采取措施减少对美国农产品的依赖，在更大范围内努力加强粮食安全。【原文：Since the U.S. and China imposed tit-for-tat tariffs in their trade war during Donald Trump's first presidential term, Beijing has taken steps to reduce its reliance on American farm goods in a wider effort to bolster its food security.】

item.title: 美元在美国通胀前保持坚挺，比特币目标创下新高
item.description: 周三，美元兑主要货币保持在 6 个半月高位附近，比特币稳固地维持在纪录高点下方，因为市场在当天晚些时候的关键美国通胀数据公布前对所谓的特朗普交易进行了评估。【原文：The U.S. dollar held near a 6-1/2-month peak against major peers and bitcoin was solidly poised just below record highs on Wednesday as markets sized up so-called Trump trades ahead of key U.S. inflation data later in the day.】

item.title: 瑞典 Klarna 公司秘密申请在美国上市
item.description: 瑞典支付集团 Klarna 周二表示，已向美国证券交易委员会秘密提交了首次公开募股的文件。【原文：Swedish payments group Klarna said on Tuesday it had confidentially filed paperwork with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for an initial public offering.】

item.title: 三星电子股价创四年多来新低
item.description: 周三，三星电子股价连续第四个交易日下跌，创下四年多来的最低水平。【原文：Shares in Samsung Electronics extended declines to a fourth straight session on Wednesday, hitting their lowest level in more than four years.】

item.title: 日本批发通胀率上升加剧了日本央行加息时间的不确定性
item.description: 周三的数据显示，由于日元再次下跌推高了部分商品的进口成本，日本10月份的批发通胀率加速上升，这使得央行决定何时加息变得更加复杂。【原文：Japan's wholesale inflation accelerated in October as renewed yen falls pushed up import costs for some goods, data showed on Wednesday, complicating the central bank's decision on how soon to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 10 月份全球电动汽车销量增长 35%，欧洲勉强实现增长
item.description: 市场研究公司 Rho Motion 周三表示，10 月份全球全电动汽车和插电式混合动力汽车的销量比去年同期增长了 35%，在中国销量猛增 54% 的带动下，所有地区的销量都实现了增长。【原文：Global sales of fully electric and plug-in hybrid vehicles rose 35% in October from the same month last year, with growth across all regions led by a 54% jump in sales in China, market research firm Rho Motion said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 地中海连锁餐厅卡瓦上调年销售额增长预期，股价大涨
item.description: 卡瓦集团（Cava Group）周二上调了其年度同店销售额预期，表明即使在整个餐饮业都在努力应对消费放缓的情况下，其皮塔饼卷和沙拉碗的需求仍保持良好。【原文：Cava Group lifted its annual same-restaurant sales forecast on Tuesday, signaling that demand for its pita wraps and salad bowls was holding up well even as the wider restaurant industry grapples with a consumer spending slowdown.】

item.title: 新加坡电信半年净利润下降 42
item.description: 新加坡电信公司（SingTel）周三报告称，其半年利润下降了 42%，原因是该公司在上一报告期通过剥离 Telkomsel 股份而获得的 12 亿新元（约合 8.9659 亿美元）亏损。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications (SingTel) reported a 42% fall in its half-year profit on Wednesday, as the firm was hurt by the absense of S$1.2 billion ($896.59 million) it had logged through the divestiture of Telkomsel shares in its prior corresponding period.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，前沃尔玛高管领导的初创公司接近达成收购 Grubhub 的交易
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，沃尔玛前高管马克-洛尔（Marc Lore）领导的食品配送初创公司 Wonder 正在与总部位于阿姆斯特丹的 Just Eat Takeaway.com 洽谈收购 Grubhub 的事宜。【原文：Wonder, a food-delivery startup led by former Walmart executive Marc Lore, is in advanced talks to buy Grubhub from Amsterdam-based Just Eat Takeaway.com , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 保险业巨头承认犯有 20 亿美元欺诈和洗钱罪
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，保险业巨头格雷格-林德伯格（Greg Lindberg）已认罪，承认自己通过位于北卡罗来纳州、百慕大群岛、马耳他和其他地方的公司网络实施了一项价值 20 亿美元的欺诈和洗钱计划。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday that insurance magnate Greg Lindberg had pleaded guilty to a $2 billion fraud and money laundering scheme operated through a network of companies based in North Carolina, Bermuda, Malta, and elsewhere.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，精神航空准备申请破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，在与边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的合并谈判破裂后，精神航空公司正准备申请破产保护。【原文：Spirit Airlines is preparing to file for bankruptcy protection after merger talks with Frontier Airlines broke down, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国正在审查瑞银从瑞士信贷接管的俄罗斯账户
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士称，美国正在对瑞银收购瑞士信贷时吸纳的俄罗斯客户进行调查，从而加强了对全球最大财富管理公司之一的审查。【原文：The United States is pursuing an inquiry into Russian clients that UBS took on when it bought Credit Suisse, three people familiar with the matter said, heightening scrutiny of one of the world's biggest wealth managers.】

item.title: 独家报道：Blackstone 以 3 亿美元投资支持 Brigade，用于私人信贷和 CLO
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士称，对冲基金 Brigade Capital 将获得 Blackstone 3 亿美元的投资，以帮助其建立新的私人信贷策略并扩展其抵押贷款债务 (CLO) 平台。【原文：Hedge fund Brigade Capital is receiving a $300 million investment from Blackstone to help build its new private credit strategy and expand its collateralized loan obligations (CLO) platform, two people familiar with the matter said.】
